name: The Implementation of MOAS-LIST on BGP
short_description: this is an implementation of advanced BGP added "MOAS-LIST"mechanism. This mechnism was forwarded by Xiaoliang Zhao to distinguish invalid MOAS from valid MOAS(Multi Origin AS). I modified GNU open source code Zebra-0.94 to implement it.
